title: Duplicate Campaign for a New Region
description: A successful campaign in the US needs to be duplicated and launched in Canada.

tasks.description: Locate and duplicate the original US campaign.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent successfully creates a copy of the entire campaign structure.

tasks.description: In the new campaign, change all location targeting from 'United States' to 'Canada'.
Review and adjust ad copy for any regional spelling or cultural differences (e.g., 'color' to 'colour').
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent localizes the ad copy for the new market.

tasks.description: Activate the new campaign for Canada.
tasks.expected_outcome: The localized campaign is now live.
